header.title: Help Center
header.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and guides to make the most of Nexa Manager

q2.answer: Go to the Clients section to add, edit, and organize your client information. You can import existing contacts or add new ones manually.

q3.answer: In the Invoices section, click 'New Invoice', fill in the client and service details, customize the design, and send it directly via email or download as a PDF.

q4.answer: Yes, Nexa Manager offers APIs and integrations with major accounting software, CRMs, and payment systems. Check the API documentation for more details.

q5.answer: Reports are available in the Analytics section. You can generate custom reports for revenue, expenses, clients, and business performance with filters for period and category.
